column2: "Na iyi ekyir muhun abɔfo baanan a wogyinagyina asaase mfɛndzanan no ano
column3: dzedze asaase mframa anan no mu
column4: na mframa ammbɔ wɔ asaase anaa po anaa dua biara do."

column2: "Na muhun ɔbɔfo bi so a ɔdze Nyankopɔn tseasefo no nsɔwano no dɛ ofi wipuei reba: na ɔdze ndze kɛse tseaa mu kyerɛɛ abɔfo baanan a wɔama hɔn kwan dɛ wɔnhaw po nye asaase no"

column3: Mma hom nnhaw asaase anaa po
column5: ma onkodu dɛ yɛasɔw hɛn Nyankopɔn nkowaa ano wɔ hɔn momapɔw do."

column2: "Na metsee hɔn a wɔsɔɔw hɔn ano no hɔn dodow
column3: mpem ɔha eduanan anan a wɔasɔw hɔn ano wɔ Israelmba mbusuakuw nyina mu."

column2: "Juda ebusuakuw mu mpemduebien: Reuben ebusuakuw mu mpemduebien: Gad ebusuakuw mu mpemduebien:"
"Aser ebusuakuw mu mpemduebien: Naftali ebusuakuw mu mpemduebien: Manaasɛ ebusuakuw mu mpemduebien:"
"Simeon ebusuakuw mu mpemduebien: Levi ebusuakuw mu mpemduebien: Isakar ebusuakuw mu mpemduebien:"
"Zebulun ebusuakuw mu mpemduebien: Josef ebusuakuw mu mpemduebien: Benjamin ebusuakuw mu mpemduebien."

column4: nyimpadodow kɛse a obi nntum nnkan hɔn a wofi amanaman
column8: gyinagyina ahengua no nye Eguambaa no enyim
column10: na wokitsakitsa berɛw wɔ hɔn nsamu;"

column2: "na wɔdze ndze kɛse tseaa mu dɛ
column3: Nkwagye nka hɛn Nyankopɔn a ɔtse ahengua no do

column2: "Na abɔfo no nyina etwa ahengua no nye mpanyimfo no nye atseasefo no ho ehyia
column3: na wɔdze hɔn enyim butubutuuw famu

column9: nye ahoɔdzen nka hɛn Nyankopɔn mbersantsen mfesantsen. Amen."

column2: "Na mpanyimfo no baako bisaa me dɛ
column3: Woananom nye hɔn a wɔhyehyɛ ntar fitaa yi? Na wofi hen?"

column4: ɔwo na inyim. Na ɔsee me dɛ
column5: Woyi nye hɔn a wofi ahohia kɛse no mu no
column7: na ayɛ fitaa wɔ Eguambaa no bɔgyaa mu."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi na wɔwɔ Nyankopɔn ahengua no enyim; na wɔsom no adzekyee nye adzesaa wɔ n’asɔrdan mu: na nyia ɔtse ahengua no do no bɛtserɛw ne ntamadan mu akata hɔn do."

column3: na eso nsukɔm renndze hɔn bio; na eso ewia rennhye hɔn anaa ɔhyew biara rennka hɔn:"

column2: "na Eguambaa no a ɔwɔ ahengua no finimfin no bɛyɛ hɔn guanhwɛfo
column3: na ɔdze hɔn akɔ nkwa nsubura ho: na Nyankopɔn bɛpepa nyinsuwa nyina efi hɔn enyiwa mu."
